-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | SVDLIBC bindings for HMatrix
--   
--   Bindings for the sparse singular value decomposition provided by
--   SVDLIBC.
@package hmatrix-svdlibc
@version 0.3.1

module Numeric.LinearAlgebra.SVD.SVDLIBC

-- | <tt>svd rank a</tt> is the sparse SVD of matrix <tt>a</tt> with the
--   given rank This function handles the conversion to svdlibc's sparse
--   representation.
svd :: Int -> Matrix Double -> (Matrix Double, Vector Double, Matrix Double)
instance Eq DenseMatrix
instance Ord DenseMatrix
instance Show DenseMatrix
instance Eq SparseMatrix
instance Ord SparseMatrix
instance Show SparseMatrix
